title: 84/63/EEC: Commission Decision of 26 January 1984 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Dionex - Ion Chromatograph, model 2010' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 26 January 1984
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Dionex - Ion Chromatograph, model 2010' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(84/63/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Dionex - Ion Chromatograph, model 2010', which is the subject of an application by the United Kingdom of 26 July 1983, may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 January 1984.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 74, 18. 3. 1982, p. 4.
(3) OJ No L 318, 13. 12. 1979, p. 32.
